description:
It is now midnight. Goichi and the others start moving as it is time to put the Great Kyoto Fire plan into action, when they witness Shishio`s other underlings being chased by the police. Henya is annoyed that the fires haven`t started on time. Meanwhile, an order is dispatched to the Ten Swords, and they start moving upon hearing their orders. Behind the scenes, Kenshin and the rest arrive at Osaka Bay only to come across something.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Grand incendie de Kyoto, première partie
